original: intros s0 a p sigma pa Hsc Hsa. unfold state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset in *. intros a0 p0 Hmap. apply sproductl_1 in Hmap as [r0 [r1 [Hmap1 Hmap2]]]. specialize (Hsa a0 r0 Hmap1) as [n [Hget0 Hlen0]]. specialize (Hsc a0 r1 Hmap2) as [m [Hget1 Hlen1]]. exists (n + m). split. - rewrite <- pre_ad_concat_assoc. apply Hget0. - apply pl_tl_length_pl_produit; auto.
